#summary Configure Applications

= application.xml =
{{{
<app>
	<controllers>
		<controller class="ExampleController" url="*.action"/>
		<controller class="ExampleController" url="*.do"/>
	</controllers>
	<templates>
		<template class="ExampleTemplate" file="example.tpe"/>
	</templates>
	<dviews>
		<dview class="ExampleDynamicView" path="example.view"/>
	</dviews>
</app>
}}}
